remarks: A projective map value is a closed projective subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmapsubcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapsubcl.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapsubcl.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
pmapsubclN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) e. C ) $.
